############
Installation
############

************
Dependencies
************

The Beta version version of ``Landsifier`` requires:

- NumPy (>= 1.19.1)
- Matplotlib (>= 3.0.2)
- SciPy (>= 1.5.4)
- Shapely (>=1.6)
- GeoPandas (>=0.6.1)
- scikit-learn (>=0.24.2)
- utm (>=0.7.0)
- TensorFlow (>= 1.13.1)
- pyproj (>=1.9.6)
- osgeo (>=2.3.3)
- Giotto-tda (>=0.5.1)
- elevation (>=1.0.6)
